title: Understanding Entropy in Melting
text: Entropy is a measure of randomness or disorder in a system. Think about what happens at the molecular level when ice cream melts. Does the order of molecules increase or decrease?

title: Energy Transfer in Melting
text: Consider how energy is transferred in the melting process. Does adding heat to the ice cream make the molecules more or less ordered?

title: Environmental Impact on Entropy
text: A hot day adds thermal energy to the ice cream. How do you think this influences the entropy of the ice cream?

title: Relating Energy and Disorder
text: As energy in the form of heat is added to the ice cream, the molecules move more freely. How does this affect the level of disorder?

title: Predict the Entropy Change
text: Will the melting of ice cream result in a positive, negative, or no change in entropy?
